  • Uses of DinoActor in game.dinosaurs

    Subclasses of DinoActor in game.dinosaurs
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Allosaur
    An aggressive carnivorous dinosaur that can attack Stegosaur.
    class 
    Brachiosaur
    A herbivorous dinosaur that can eat fruits from trees, can destroy bushes and cannot be attacked by Allosaur.
    class 
    Stegosaur
    A herbivorous dinosaur that can eat fruits on the ground and on bushes, and can be attacked by Allosaur.
    Fields in game.dinosaurs with type parameters of type DinoActor
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private HashMap<DinoActor,​Integer>
    Allosaur.victims
    A hashmap to keep track of all DinoActors that the Allosaur has attacked by the Allosaur before within 20 turns.
    Methods in game.dinosaurs with parameters of type DinoActor
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Allosaur.addAttackedVictims​(DinoActor victim)
    Add a DinoActor that was just attacked into the victims hashMap.
    void
    Allosaur.decrementAttackedPeriod​(DinoActor victim)
    Decrements the attacked period of the victim
    int
    Allosaur.getAttackedPeriod​(DinoActor victim)
    Returns the number of turns that the Allosaur has to wait before it can attack the victim again.
    boolean
    Allosaur.hasAttackedVictim​(DinoActor victim)
    Returns true if the Allosaur has attacked the same DinoActor within 20 turns, false otherwise.
    void
    Allosaur.removeVictim​(DinoActor victim)
    Remove a DinoActor from the victims hashMap.

  • Uses of DinoActor in game.follow

    Methods in game.follow with parameters of type DinoActor
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private static boolean
    FollowMateBehaviour.breedingPossible​(DinoActor actorAsDino, DinoActor anotherDino)
    Returns true if two DinoActors passed in are of different sex, same species and both capable to breed to indicate it is possible for mating to happen, false otherwise.
    (package private) abstract Location
    FollowBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor actorAsDino)
    Checks whether the Location destination has a target that the DinoActor is trying to find and returns it if true, otherwise null is returned.
    (package private) Location
    FollowFoodOnGroundBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor actorAsDino)
    Checks if there is food on the ground that the DinoActor can eat at location destination.
    (package private) Location
    FollowFoodOnPlantBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor actorAsDino)
    Checks if there is a plant with fruits that the DinoActor can eat from at location destination.
    (package private) Location
    FollowMateBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor actorAsDino)
    Checks if there is a mate that the DinoActor can follow at the location destination.
    (package private) Location
    FollowVictimBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor actorAsDino)
    Checks if there is a victim that the DinoActor can follow at the location destination.
    (package private) abstract boolean
    FollowBehaviour.motivatedToFollow​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor has a reason / fulfills certain criteria to be able to follow something
    (package private) boolean
    FollowFoodOnGroundBehaviour.motivatedToFollow​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor is hungry and to indicate that it will attempt to move towards food on the ground, false otherwise.
    (package private) boolean
    FollowFoodOnPlantBehaviour.motivatedToFollow​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor is hungry and is herbivorous to indicate that it will attempt to follow a plant that has fruits, false otherwise.
    (package private) boolean
    FollowMateBehaviour.motivatedToFollow​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor can breed to indicate that it will attempt to follow another DinoActor to mate with it, false otherwise.
    (package private) boolean
    FollowVictimBehaviour.motivatedToFollow​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor is hungry to indicate that it will attempt to follow another DinoActor to attack it for food, false otherwise.
